languages.text: {n}Не дождавшись ответа, Паскаль тяжело произносит:{/n} "Ты всегда был непостижим, технобрат".
{n}Without waiting for an answer, Pasqal says gravely,{/n} "You have always been inscrutable, tech-comrade."
languages.original_text: {n}Не дождавшись ответа, Паскаль тяжело произносит:{/n} "Ты всегда был непостижим, технобрат".

traits.locale_text: {n}Without waiting for an answer, Pasqal says gravely,{/n} "You have always been inscrutable, tech-brother."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Without waiting for an answer, Pasqal says gravely,{/n} "You have always been inscrutable, tech-brother."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Without waiting for an answer, Pasqal says gravely,{/n} "You have always been inscrutable, tech-comrade."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}答えを待つことなく、パスカルは厳格に語る。{/n}「あなたはいつも不可解なことを言うな、技術同胞よ」
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for an answer, Pasqal says gravely,{/n} "You have always been inscrutable, tech-comrade."

traits.locale_text: {n}答えを待つことなく、パスカルは厳格に語る。{/n}「あなたはいつも不可解なことを言うな、技術同胞よ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡未能等到回答，他沉重地开了口。{/n}“技术伙伴，你一直都是这么难以理解。”
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for an answer, Pasqal says gravely,{/n} "You have always been inscrutable, tech-comrade."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡未能等到回答，他沉重地开了口。{/n}“技术伙伴，你一直都是这么难以理解。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sans même attendre de réponse, Pasqal ajoute :{/n} « Vous avez toujours été impénétrable, technoconfrère. »
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for an answer, Pasqal says gravely,{/n} "You have always been inscrutable, tech-comrade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sans même attendre de réponse, Pasqal ajoute :{/n} « Vous avez toujours été impénétrable, technoconfrère. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sin esperar una respuesta, Pasqal dice solemnemente:{/n} «Que inescrutable ha sido siempre, tecnocamarada».
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for an answer, Pasqal says gravely,{/n} "You have always been inscrutable, tech-comrade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin esperar una respuesta, Pasqal dice solemnemente:{/n} «Que inescrutable ha sido siempre, tecnocamarada».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ohne auf eine Antwort zu warten, sagt Pasqal ernst:{/n} "Ihr wart schon immer unergründlich, Techkamerad."
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for an answer, Pasqal says gravely,{/n} "You have always been inscrutable, tech-comrade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ohne auf eine Antwort zu warten, sagt Pasqal ernst:{/n} "Ihr wart schon immer unergründlich, Techkamerad."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal; yanıt beklemeden, ağırbaşlılıkla konuşuyor.{/n} "Her zaman esrarlı biriydin tekno yoldaşım."
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for an answer, Pasqal says gravely,{/n} "You have always been inscrutable, tech-comrade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal bir yanıt beklemeden, ağırbaşlılıkla konuşuyor:{/n} "Her zaman esrarlı biriydin tekno yoldaşım."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
